SELECT lt.year, SUM(CASE WHEN w.category = '山水画' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS paintingCount, SUM(CASE WHEN w.category = '花鸟画' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS calligraphyCount FROM life_timeline lt JOIN timeline_works_rel twr ON lt.timeline_id = twr.timeline_id JOIN works w ON twr.works_id = w.works_id GROUP BY lt.year ORDER BY lt.year
